responses:
For drink recommendations, you can choose from several options with the following writing format: 
 "/recommend type (coffee/tea/other) sweetness level (not/a bit/moderate/strong) acidity level (not/a bit/moderate/strong) savoriness level (not/a bit/moderate/strong) temperature (cold/hot) with milk (yes/no) and fruit flavor (yes/no)".
 Make sure to fill in your preferences in order, and there should be **no comma** between preferences. Begin your message with **"/recommend"**. 

Examples of correct writing:
/recommend coffee strong not moderate cold yes yes

Examples of incorrect writing:
recommend others, hot, bitter, don't want savory, yes, don't want.
